org.spf4j.base

Interface ExecutionContextFactory<T extends ExecutionContext>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProfiledExecutionContextFactory

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public interface ExecutionContextFactory<T extends ExecutionContext>
    Author:
    Zoltan Farkas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T start(String name, CharSequence id, ExecutionContext parent, ExecutionContext.Relation relation, long startTimeNanos, long deadlineNanos)
      Create a ExecutionContext.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        T start(String name,
        @Nullable
        CharSequence id,
        @Nullable
        ExecutionContext parent,
        ExecutionContext.Relation relation,
        long startTimeNanos,
        long deadlineNanos)
        Create a ExecutionContext.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the context.
        parent - parent execution context. (null if this is root)
        deadlineNanos - the deadline of the context.
        onClose - a callback that needs to be executed when context is closed.
        Returns:
